listitem.para:
#define TN_BFA_SET 0x1111
Command for <tt>TN_BFA()</tt> macro: Set bits in the bit field by mask; <tt>...</tt> macro param should be set to the bit mask to set.

#define TN_BFA_CLR 0x2222
Command for <tt>TN_BFA()</tt> macro: Clear bits in the bit field by mask; <tt>...</tt> macro param should be set to the bit mask to clear.

#define TN_BFA_INV 0x3333
Command for <tt>TN_BFA()</tt> macro: Invert bits in the bit field by mask; <tt>...</tt> macro param should be set to the bit mask to invert.

#define TN_BFA_WR 0xAAAA
Command for <tt>TN_BFA()</tt> macro: Write bit field; <tt>...</tt> macro param should be set to the value to write.

#define TN_BFA_RD 0xBBBB
Command for <tt>TN_BFA()</tt> macro: Read bit field; <tt>...</tt> macro param ignored.

#define TN_BFA
Macro for atomic access to the structure bit field.

#define TN_BFAR
Macro for atomic access to the structure bit field specified as a range.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para: Atomic bit-field access macros for PIC24/dsPIC.
Initially, the code was taken from the article by Alex Borisov (russian), and modified a bit.
The kernel would not probably provide that kind of functionality, but the kernel itself needs it, so, it is made public so that application can use it too.
